short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple page monitor extension for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Moni is a simple page monitor extension.  
This extension is still under development, so there might exist bugs and the remote server might not be working sometimes.

More information can be found here: 
    https://github.com/shd101wyy/Moni_Doc
